string.name: us_bottom_text
string.b: Result should include the first defender to have control of the baseball.

string.name: faq_que1
string.span: 1. How does the app know which game I am watching?

string.name: faq_ans1
string.span: The app does NOT know which game you are watching. The umpire is responsible for keeping the app in sync with the live game and inputting the results of the live game to award points to each player.
